item.title: Notes on Kim Wexler
item.description: Breaking Bad viewers who hated Skyler White finally got the complicit, unconditionally loving wife they wanted in Better Call Saul. Now what?

item.title: Review: Crashing through the queer lens
item.description: Whether intentionally or not, Waller-Bridge has a knack for writing straight characters that are enjoyable to queer audiences.

item.title: Heartstopper is redefining queer media
item.description: Confronting the unaccepting abusive parents and homophobic bullies and discriminatory governments of the world is a necessary and important task, but one I'm not necessarily up for when I boot up Netflix or go to a theater.
